title: Hong Kong revs up development of autonomous vehicles with new, expanded trials
summary: Hong Kong is ramping up efforts to develop driverless vehicle services by launching a trial at Cyberport and expanding an initiative at the West Kowloon arts hub following road tests in other areas.
fullContent: Hong Kong is ramping up efforts to develop driverless vehicle services by launching a trial at Cyberport and expanding an initiative at the West Kowloon arts hub following road tests in other areas. The Transport Department said on Thursday that mainland Chinese tech giant Baidu was also interested in applying to test autonomous vehicles in Kai Tak, in addition to its trials in Northern Lantau and Tung Chung. The trial at the West Kowloon Cultural District was expected to move forward to road...

title: US Producer Prices Climb by Most in Three Years
summary: US wholesale inflation rose in July by the most in three years, as the producer price index increased 0.9% from a month earlier after no change in June, and 3.3% from a year ago. Meanwhile, initial jobless claims decreased by 3,000 to 224,000 in the week ended Aug.
fullContent: US wholesale inflation rose in July by the most in three years, as the producer price index increased 0.9% from a month earlier after no change in June, and 3.3% from a year ago. Meanwhile, initial jobless claims decreased by 3,000 to 224,000 in the week ended Aug. 9, while continuing claims fell to 1.95 million in the previous week. Jonathan Ferro and Lisa Abramowicz report on Bloomberg Television.

title: Waiting time for Hong Kong public rental flat rises slightly to 5.4 years
summary: The average waiting time for a Hong Kong public rental flat increased slightly to 5.4 years in the second quarter of 2025 from 5.3 years in the first three months of the year despite a significant drop in the number of applications, according to the Housing Authority.
fullContent: The average waiting time for a Hong Kong public rental flat increased slightly to 5.4 years in the second quarter of 2025 from 5.3 years in the first three months of the year despite a significant drop in the number of applications, according to the Housing Authority. The authority, the city’s largest public housing provider, on Thursday pointed to applicants being allocated refurbished public housing recovered from tenants or evicted due to abuse of resources in urban areas. It also revealed...

title: US Producer Prices Rise by Most in Three Years on Services
summary: US wholesale inflation accelerated in July by the most in three years, suggesting companies are passing along higher import costs related to tariffs.
fullContent: US wholesale inflation accelerated in July by the most in three years, suggesting companies are passing along higher import costs related to tariffs.
